title: Don't like clickbait? Don't click
description: Doesn't it seem like a lot of online news sites have moved beyond reporting the news to openly inciting your outrage (and your page views)? News analyst Sally Kohn suggests — don't engage with news that looks like it just wants to make you mad. Instead, give your precious clicks to the news sites you truly trust.
author: Sally Kohn
keywords: TED, talks, communication, media, social change, social media, technology
